p.k: You can't help but be carried away by the powerful voice Marion Williams, who, with backing from her group and backup singers, sings gospel songs and spirituals as if she has lived them a thousand times over.
p.d: You can't help but be carried away by the powerful voice Marion Williams, who, with backing from Tommy Brown (piano), Joe Washington (organ), Billy Tuliver (drums), and singers Barbara White and Ann Bolden, sings gospel songs and spirituals as if she has lived them a thousand times over. The repertoire includes such familiar tunes as "Peace in the Valley," "We Shall Overcome," and "Michael, Row the Boat Ashore."
